# Welcome!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

My name is Lauryn Howlett and I am a master's student at Colorado State University. I am dedicated to understanding and finding solutions to sustainability issues in the agricultural sector. I am passionate about helping communities connect to nature and improving conservation efforts.
